channel.title: 317 PI webclient?
channel.description:
Hello everyone i'm trying to make a webclient for my friend i know how to make it from a normal client that works with .class files but the thing is his client work with .bat files so does anyone know how to make them to .class files or to import them into a html code? I also don't understand how this client connects to his ip adres? if someone can help me post here a messenge THANK YOU FOR READING THIS !!
client: http://www.mediafire.com/?109fzsmb65ywhz5
play 32bits says: @echo off title Hurtscape java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 play 64 bits says: @echo off title Hurtscape "C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
msn: r_i_338@hotmail.com email: ri@riip.net website: www.riip.net youtube: www.youtube.com/rilind101

item.title: 317 PI webclient?
item.dc:creator: @riip riip
item.description:
@riip wrote:

Hello everyone i’m trying to make a webclient for my friend i know how to make it from a normal client that works with .class files but the thing is his client work with .bat files so does anyone know how to make them to .class files or to import them into a html code? I also don’t understand how this client connects to his ip adres? if someone can help me post here a messenge THANK YOU FOR READING THIS !!

client: http://www.mediafire.com/?109fzsmb65ywhz5

play 32bits says:
@echo off
title Hurtscape
java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
play 64 bits says:
@echo off
title Hurtscape
“C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

msn: r_i_338@hotmail.com
email: ri@riip.net
website: www.riip.net
youtube: www.youtube.com/rilind101
